      • showMenu

        public void showMenu(boolean animate)
        Makes the whole FloatingActionMenu(android.content.Context, android.util.AttributeSet, int) to appear and sets its visibility to View.VISIBLE
        Parameters:
        animate - if true - plays "show animation"

      • hideMenu

        public void hideMenu(boolean animate)
        Makes the FloatingActionMenu(android.content.Context, android.util.AttributeSet, int) to disappear and sets its visibility to View.INVISIBLE
        Parameters:
        animate - if true - plays "hide animation"

      • toggleMenu

        public void toggleMenu(boolean animate)

      • showMenuButton

        public void showMenuButton(boolean animate)
        Makes the FloatingActionButton to appear inside the FloatingActionMenu(android.content.Context, android.util.AttributeSet, int) and sets its visibility to View.VISIBLE
        Parameters:
        animate - if true - plays "show animation"

      • hideMenuButton

        public void hideMenuButton(boolean animate)
        Makes the FloatingActionButton to disappear inside the FloatingActionMenu(android.content.Context, android.util.AttributeSet, int) and sets its visibility to View.INVISIBLE
        Parameters:
        animate - if true - plays "hide animation"
